price: Alisema (Luut'i): Hakika nyinyi ni watu msio juulikana.
footnotes: Luut'i aliwaambia: Watu nyinyi sikujueni, na nafsi yangu inatishika nanyi. Naogopa msituletee balaa.

version.title: Swahili translation - Ali Muhsen Alberwany
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Swahili by Ali Muhsen Alberwany
